DOC.brief_summary: This study compares pre- and postoperative (at 6 month) quality of life and pathomorphology of the pelvis (by MRI defecation) after a STARR procedure for outlet obstruction. - Trial with surgical intervention
DOC.brief_title: Stapled Trans Anal Rectal Resection (STARR) for Outlet Obstruction: Functional and Morphological Outcome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: All patients at our institution treated with the STARR operation Exclusion criteria: Age under 18, Chronic or acute inflammatory disease of the bowel or rectum
